alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 12 at 1:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following areas, Aguila Valley and Tonopah Desert. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of normally dry washes, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Unbridged crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. When encountering a flooded roadway, Turn Around, Don`t Drown.
